(Sorry about the mix up. I'm real busy in the afternoons and when I 
gety back there are a zillion messages. I'll try to keep up.)

Brix/Octociz


Brix/Octociz look at the maximal bot with wide eyes.

"Yes, it needs one badly some kind of mechanical device to store it 
within. Please, you must have something."

Deep within, a voice contacts Brix.

(Let me take over.)

Brix eases control to Octociz

"Hello, I'm Octociz, the other spark. If it's possible, I would like 
a body. But if it's not, I know the process of how to hook up a spark 
to a computer. I could run some of the systems. But could you look 
for a body first, please."

Vulois

Vulois was about to give up all hope when he saw the three figures he 
had been hoping for: Soundwave, Battera and Cybershark. He yelled in 
rejoice.

"Hurray! All is not lost. Quickly now, come inside. There is much to 
talk about!"

Vulois ran inside to prepare the discussion table for their arrival.
